title: I am searching for englisch speeking active players [ Read my Post]
body:
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} Hey, at first thank u for reading. i am a german player on the server EUW and i am searching for a active group of players to play with. IMPORTANT: I am searching for english speeking players even when my english is not the best an i am also searching for THAT IS ALSO VERY IMPORTANT an englisch "Teamspeak server" to talk while playing because its fun and i play for fun but also try my best. If u and ur friends fulfill those criteria pls ADD me :).

Greetings Svea / Alenolaja

replies.body:
yoo

im actually writing mobile so I can't add you because I don't have the app :D
You can add me - you see my name. I am learning english as much as possible and im streaming in english too (up to 30 viewers for now only :( )

But I'd come alone .. XD

greets, fangzi
i cant add u or are u lvl 2 somehow?

> [{quoted}](name=Alenolaja,realm=EUW,application-id=ElKI1ocy,discussion-id=7VNRJWTO,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-05-22T20:03:17.696+0000)
>
> i cant add u or are u lvl 2 somehow?

extra symbols, addet you now
Hey, add me - I dont mind to speak English or German.

Ich weiß nicht, aber irgendwie verwirrt mich dein Post etwas. 
Du bist deutschsprachiger Spieler und suchst jetzt Leute, die Englisch sprechen - aber warum im deutschen Forum? Ich glaube im englischen Forum könntest du deine Chancen maximieren.
